history.proof: intros a b H1 H2. unfold Rmax. destruct (Rle_dec a b). - qsimpl time: 2 use: Rmax_le_compat. qsimpl time: 2 use: Rmax_le_compat. qsimpl time: 2 use: Rmax_le_compat. hauto use: Rplus_0_r, Rplus_le_compat, Rle_refl, Rplus_comm. - qsimpl time: 2 use: Rplus_le_le_0_compat,Rmax_le_compat. apply Rsqr_incr_0_var. + apply Rsqr_incr_0. * hcrush use: Rle_0_sqr, Rplus_0_r, Rplus_le_compat_l, Rsqr_incr_1, Rplus_le_le_0_compat. * srun best use: Rle_0_sqr. * srun best use: Rle_0_sqr. + hauto lq: on depth: 3.

original: intros a b H1 H2. unfold Rmax. destruct (Rle_dec a b). - apply Rmax_le_compat. + apply H1. + apply H2. - apply Rplus_le_le_0_compat. + apply Rle_0_plus. + apply Rle_0_plus.
